documentation.title: CamelCaps Function Name
documentation.standard: Functions should use camelCaps format for their names.

code.title: Valid: A function or method in camelCaps format.
Invalid: A function or method in snake_case format.

documentation.standard: Only PHP's magic methods should use a double underscore prefix.

code.title: Valid: A method not beginning with double underscore.
Invalid: A method beginning with double underscore.

documentation.standard: Methods should not be prefixed with underscore to indicate visibility.

code.title: Valid: A method not prefixed with underscore for visibility.
Invalid: A method prefixed with underscore for visibility.
